Package presentation

Class clientsController

java.lang.Object
presentation.clientsController
public class clientsController
extends java.lang.Object
Clients controller - creates the flow between the clients' scene and the application. Has the methods which perform the operations delete, update, insert and show all on the clients table, on a top level by sending the data from the user to the bussiness layer of the application.
